00030 class POIData {
00031 
00032 public:
00033 
00037    POIData( ) : m_width( 0 ), m_height( 0 ), m_offset( MC2Point( 0, 0 ) )    
00038    { }
00039 
00047    POIData( int32 width, int32 height, const MC2Point& offset ) :
00048       m_width( width ), m_height( height ), m_offset( offset ) 
00049    { }
00050 
00059    void set( int32 width, int32 height, const MC2Point& offset = MC2Point( 0, 0 ) )
00060    {
00061       m_width  = width;
00062       m_height = height;
00063       m_offset = offset;
00064    }
00065

00074                                        const POIData& coord );

00079    int32 m_width;

00094 
00100 class POICache {
00101 
00103    typedef std::map<MC2String, POIData> cache_t;
00104    
00105 public:
00106 
00110    void clear() 
00111    {
00112       m_dataStore.clear();
00113    }
00114 
00124    bool get( const MC2String& name, PixelBox& box, MC2Point& offsetPoint ) 
00125    {
00126       cache_t::const_iterator it = m_dataStore.find( name );
00127       if ( it == m_dataStore.end() ) {
00128          return false;
00129       }         
00130 
00131       // Hard coded starting point, should not matter since the point
00132       // it self is not being used, only the size of the pixelBox.
00133       MC2Point p1( 0, 0 );
00134       MC2Point p2( p1.getX() + it->second.m_width, 
00135                    p1.getY() + it->second.m_height );
00136       box.set( p1, p2 );
00137       offsetPoint = it->second.m_offset;
00138       return true;
00139    }
00140 
00145    void getCache( cache_t& in_boxes ) 
00146    {
00147       in_boxes = m_dataStore;
00148    }
00149 
00157    bool find( const MC2String& name, POIData& data )
00158    {
00159       cache_t::const_iterator it = m_dataStore.find( name );
00160       if ( it == m_dataStore.end() ) {
00161          return false;
00162       }
00163       data = it->second;
00164       return true;
00165    }
00166 
00172    void insert( const MC2String& name, POIData& data )
00173    {
00174       m_dataStore.insert( make_pair( name, data ) ); 
00175    }
00176 
00184    void insert( const MC2String& name, 
00185                 int32 width, 
00186                 int32 height, 
00187                 const MC2Point& offset = MC2Point( 0, 0 ) ) 
00188    {
00189       m_dataStore.insert( make_pair( name, POIData( width, height, offset ) ) );
00190    }
00191 
00201    bool createAndInsert( const MC2String& name, POIData& data )
00202    {
00203       MC2String imagesPath( Properties::getProperty( "IMAGES_PATH" ) );
00204       if ( imagesPath.empty() ) {
00205          imagesPath = "./";
00206       } else if ( imagesPath.find( "/", imagesPath.length() - 1 ) == 
00207                   MC2String::npos ) {
00208          // Ending / in path does not exist
00209          imagesPath += '/';
00210       } 
00211 
00212       imagesPath += name;
00213       MC2String tmp ( ".png" );
00214       imagesPath += ( tmp );
00215 
00216       MC2Point offset( 0, 0 );
00217       GDUtils::CutPoints cutPoints;
00218       if ( !GDUtils::cropTransparentOffset( imagesPath, offset, &cutPoints ) ) {
00219          return false;
00220       }
00221             
00222       data.set( cutPoints.getBottomRight().getX() - cutPoints.getTopLeft().getX(),
00223                 cutPoints.getBottomRight().getY() - cutPoints.getTopLeft().getY(),
00224                 offset );
00225 
00226       insert( name, data );      
00227       return true;
00228    }
00229 
00230 private:
00231 
00233    cache_t m_dataStore;      
00234 };
00235

00238 
00239 inline ostream& operator<< ( ostream& stream, const POIData& coord )
00240 {
00241    return stream << "( Width: " << coord.m_width << ", Height: " 
00242                  << coord.m_height << ", OffsetPosition: " 
00243                  << coord.m_offset << endl;
00244 }
